docs.text:
3 Rivers Wet Weather Atlas


The 
3 Rivers Wet Weather Atlas
 represents the next generation of mapping products from 
3 Rivers Wet Weather
. Developed by 
CivicMapper
 and hosted by 
Allegheny County
, the Atlas consolidates previous geodata and maps into one geographic information system (GIS) hosted with 
ArcGIS Online
.


The Atlas is currently in active development, with improvements to the applications and data being made on frequent basis. This page lists all Atlas products and provides links to those that are live.


Visit the 
Atlases
 page for more information on the Atlas products. For information on data and map configuration products used in ArcGIS Online, visit the 
Maps 
 Services
 page.





Regional Green Infrastructure (RGI) Atlas Products


Status:
 version 1.0 online


These products replace the Rainways GI Map found at 
http://www.3riverswetweather.org/green/community-map


RGI Atlas (Editor)


The RGI Atlas (Editor) is an ArcGIS Online web application that provides full interactivity with RGI Operational Data in an attrative user interface (UI), including editing, location-based querying, and the creation of graphic data summaries using available data. As the data and data model is improved, additional querying and summary tools will be implemented.



    
URL
http://alcogis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=ef7dc350ac004686a95c1b07054678d9





RGI Atlas (Public)


The RGI Atlas (Public) is an ArcGIS Online web application that provides interactivity with RGI Partner Data in an attrative user interface (UI). This includes location-based querying and the creation of graphic data summaries using available data. Editing is not implemented. As the data and data model is improved, additional querying and summary tools will be implemented.



    
URL:
http://alcogis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=bd350e6dc31e42048a0a38ab91767117








Regional Sewer Infrastructure (RSI) Atlas Products


Status:
  version 1.0 available; ongoing improvements


These products replace the MDS OOM found at 
http://mds.3riverswetweather.org/login.aspx?src=WEBMAP
returnuri=http://www.landbasesystems.net/CollaborativeMaps_3rwwMDS.html


RSI Atlas (Editor)


The RSI Atlas (Editor) is an ArcGIS Online web application that provides full interactivity with RSI Operational Data in an attrative user interface (UI), including editing, location-based querying, and the creation of graphic data summaries using available data. The implementation of additional analysis functionality, such as network tracing, is planned.



    
URL:
http://alcogis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=d52b7d07014f43b88554a6a51a8abe20





For a guide on how to use the RSI Atlas, visit the 
RSI Guide
 page.





Other Atlas Products


Several other existing map-based analysis tools provided by 3 Rivers Wet Weather are planned to be integrated with the Atlas:




Calibrated Radar Rainfall Data
:
 online; new version planned


Engineer's / Planner's Tool
:
 offline; new version planned


Property Owner's Tool
:
 online; new version planned
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: The  3 Rivers Wet Weather Atlas  represents the next generation of mapping products from  3 Rivers Wet Weather . Developed by  CivicMapper  and hosted by  Allegheny County , the Atlas consolidates previous geodata and maps into one geographic information system (GIS) hosted with  ArcGIS Online .  The Atlas is currently in active development, with improvements to the applications and data being made on frequent basis. This page lists all Atlas products and provides links to those that are live.  Visit the  Atlases  page for more information on the Atlas products. For information on data and map configuration products used in ArcGIS Online, visit the  Maps   Services  page.

docs.title: Other Atlas Products

docs.text:
Regional Green Infrastructure (RGI) Atlas Products


RGI Atlas (Editor)



    
URL
http://alcogis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=ef7dc350ac004686a95c1b07054678d9

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Application

    
Role
Operational/Editing

    
Access
Restricted via AlcoGIS Login 
&
 3RWW Group





The RGI Atlas (Editor) is an ArcGIS Online web application that provides full interactivity with RGI Operational Data in an attrative user interface (UI), including editing, location-based querying, and the creation of graphic data summaries using available data. As the data and data model is improved (e.g., project cost), additional querying and summary tools will be implemented.


This product requires AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group access credentials to modify.


RGI Atlas (Public)



    
URL:
http://alcogis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=bd350e6dc31e42048a0a38ab91767117

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Application

    
Role
Public Viewing

    
Access
Public





The RGI Atlas (Public) is an ArcGIS Online web application that provides interactivity with RGI Partner Data in an attrative user interface (UI). This includes location-based querying and the creation of graphic data summaries using available data. Editing is not implemented. As the data and data model is improved (e.g., project cost), additional querying and summary tools will be implemented.


This product requires AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group access credentials to modify.

RSI Atlas (Editor)



    
URL:
http://alcogis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=d52b7d07014f43b88554a6a51a8abe20

    
Type

Role
Operational/Editing

    
Access

&
 3RWW Group





The RSI Atlas (Editor) is an ArcGIS Online web application that provides full interactivity with RSI Operational Data in an attrative user interface (UI), including editing, location-based querying, and the creation of graphic data summaries using available data. The implementation of additional analysis functionality, such as network tracing, is planned.


RSI Atlas (Public)



    
URL:
none

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Application

    
Role
Public Viewing

    
Access
Public





Note: the scope of the publicly visible of regional sewer data products has not been determined yet. For now, data is limited to the RSI Atlas (Editor) version only, which can only be accessed with AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group credentials.

docs.text:
Maps and Services supporting the Regional Sewer Infrastructure (RSI) Atlas Products


These ArcGIS Online web map and service layers provide the configured map and geodata, respectively, that are used in the RSI Atlas products.


RSI Map (Editor)



    
URL:
http://arcg.is/1PXweVa

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Map

    
Role
Operational/Editing

    
Access
Restricted via AlcoGIS Login 
&
 3RWW Group





The RSI Map (Editor) is used to configure the availability and display of 
RSI Operational Data (Editor)
 geodata within the 
RSI Atlas (Editor)
 ArcGIS Online Web Application. Changes to map symbols, layouts, and other configuration settings in this map directly affect the display and functionality of the data in the 
RSI Atlas (Editor)
.


RSI Operational Data (Editor)



    
URL (point data):
 http://services1.arcgis.com/vdNDkVykv9vEWFX4/arcgis/rest/services/3RWWRSIFL/FeatureServer/0

    
URL (line data):
 http://services1.arcgis.com/vdNDkVykv9vEWFX4/arcgis/rest/services/3RWWRSIFL/FeatureServer/1

    
URL (tiles):
http://tiles.arcgis.com/tiles/vdNDkVykv9vEWFX4/arcgis/rest/services/3RWWRSITL/MapServer

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Feature Layers and Tile Layer

    
Role
Operational/Editing

    
Access
Restricted via AlcoGIS Login 
&
 3RWW Group





The RSI Operational Data (Editor) is the feature service referenced by the 
RSI Map (Editor)
 and 
RSI Atlas (Editor)
.  Currently, this data is an import of the previous OneOverallMap (OOM) data. For the next iteration, it will be provided in using extended version of the Esri Local Government Information Model (LGIM) data model, which better supports geoprocessing and interoperability.


RSI Web Map (Public)



    
URL:
none

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Map

    
Role
Public Viewing

    
Access
Public





Note: the scope of the publicly visible of regional sewer data products has not been determined yet. For now, data is limited to the operational/editing versions only, which can only be accessed with AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group credentials.


RSI Partner Data (Public)



    
URL:
none

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Feature Layer

    
Role
Public Viewing

    
Access
Public





Note: the scope of the publicly visible of regional sewer data products has not been determined yet. For now, data is limited to the operational/editing versions only, which can only be accessed with AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group credentials.





Maps and Services supporting the Regional Green Infrastructure (RGI) Atlas Products


These ArcGIS Online web map and service layers provide the configured map and geodata, respectively, that are used in the RGI Atlas products.


RGI Web Map (Editor)



    
URL
http://arcg.is/1PXu73G

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Map

    
Access
Restricted via AlcoGIS Login 
&
 3RWW Group





The RGI Map (Editor) is used to configure the availability and display of 
RGI Operational Data (Editor)
 geodata within the 
RGI Atlas (Editor)
 ArcGIS Online Web Application. Changes to map symbols, layouts, and other configuration settings in this map directly affect the display and functionality of the data in the 
RGI Atlas (Editor)
.


RGI Operational Data (Editor)


For now, see 
RGI Partner Data (Public)
.


RGI Web Map (Public)



    
URL
http://arcg.is/1PXtneX
Type
ArcGIS Online - Web Map

    
Role
Public Viewing

    
Access
Public





The RGI Map (Public) is used to configure the availability and display of 
RGI Partner Data (Public)
 geodata within the 
RGI Atlas (Public)
 ArcGIS Online Web Application; specifically, publicly visible attributes are limited via this product. Administrative changes to map symbols, layouts, and other configuration settings in this map directly affect the display and functionality of the data in the 
RGI Atlas (Public)
. This product requires AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group access credentials to modify.


RGI Partner Data (Public)



    
URL
http://services1.arcgis.com/vdNDkVykv9vEWFX4/arcgis/rest/services/3RWW_Atlas_Green_Infrastructure_Inventory/FeatureServer/0

    
Type
ArcGIS Online - Feature Layer

    
Role
Public Viewing

    
Access
Public





The RGI Partner Data (Public) is the feature service referenced by the 
RGI Map (Public)
 and 
RSI Atlas (Public)
. It is a link to the data only; it requires AlcoGIS Login 
 3RWW Group access credentials to modify.

docs.text:
The Regional Sewer Infrastructre (RSI) Atlas User Guide


Note: this documentation is in active development


Interface


Map Controls


By default, drag the map to pan; use a scroll wheel if available to zoom.


Zoom buttons
 are located in the upper left-hand corner.


A 
Default extent
 button will reset the map to it's inital view.


A 
Locate me
 button will set the map to your location, if your browser and/or device has the necessary geo-location capabilities enabled (these vary by device).


Measurement Widget


Located in the top-right corner, the 
Measurement
 widget allows you to quickly measure distance and/or area on the map.


This tool can also quickly identify the longitude and latitude of a point placed on the map.


Printing Widget


Located in the top-right corner, the 
Printing
 widget allows you to print your current map view to a pdf or one of several image formats.


Editing Widget


Located in the top-right corner, the 
Editing
 widget at this time allows you to add annotation markers to the map and make notes.


In future iterations of this application, this widget will also enable direct editing of the sewer network.


Information Window


The left side of the screen contains a collapsible window that displays several types of information or options for configuring the map.




About
: Provides an overview of the application.


Legend
: Summarizes the symbols for features shown on the map currently.


Map Layers
: All data layers available for viewing on the map, including RSI data.


Basemap Gallery
: Available basemaps for display underneath the Map Layers.


Select Features (under 'more')
: Provides the ability to filter features from the RSI data. See 'Analyzing' below for more information.


Summarize Features (under 'more')
: Provides the ability to generate reports on the RSI data. See 'Analyzing' below for more information.




Common Tasks


Changing Map Layers


A number of data layers are available for viewing on the map in addition to the RSI data. This includes several map services provided by Allegheny County, which provide information ranging from parcel boundaries to recent aerial imagery. The user can opt to turn layers and sub-layers on or off as needed.


Changing Basemaps


The user can optionally select the base map shown underneath the map layers. By default, this is set to a global imagery map from Esri; however, other basemap options such as 'Dark Canvas' may provide the user with higher legibility and clarity for printing.


Finding Locations


"Find address or place"


AC EAMS AP and ST Locator: a geolocation service provided by Allegheny County, which uses up-to-date addressing maintained for emergency services.
Esri World Geocoder: a geolocation service with worldwide coverage; accuracy may be


Filtering Features


Select Projects (under 'more')


Adding Annotations


Editing Features


Tracing the Network


Generating Summaries
docs.title: RSI Guide
